definitions.definition: A wild feline , of species Puma concolor , native to the Americas.
An older woman who actively seeks the casual, often sexual, companionship of younger men, by implication a female “ sexual predator ”.
examples: A cougar approached Warren at the Palomino Club and asked for a dance.

main_definition: A wild feline , of species Puma concolor , native to the Americas.
secondary_definitions: ( Canada , US , slang ) An older woman who actively seeks the casual, often sexual, companionship of younger men, by implication a female “ sexual predator ”.
